title: AIML - Engineering Program Manager, Developer Tools
summary: Engineering Program Managers (EPMs) are one of the secrets to Apple’s success in delivering impactful customer experiences across its vast ecosystem. Our team aims to deliver the next generation of AI-powered products, services, and tools that will enable developers inside and outside Apple to be at their most creative and efficient.
description: In this capacity, you will partner with leaders as well as a diverse set of team members to build and deliver AI-powered software initiatives according to Apple’s high standards. You will be responsible for cross-functional alignment, project planning, tracking, execution, and reporting, while also overseeing service qualification, deployment, and operations.
preferred_qualifications: Strong leadership skills including the ability to build positive relationships and influence others. Excellent spoken and written communication to tailor communication style to multiple audiences.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. The base pay range for this role is between $136,300 and $248,700, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location.
